languages.text: {n}При виде вас Идира растягивает губы в улыбке и кивает чему-то у вас за плечом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}При виде вас Идира растягивает губы в улыбке и кивает чему-то у вас за плечом.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При виде вас Идира растягивает губы в улыбке и кивает чему-то у вас за плечом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉见到你，嘴角露出了微笑，对你肩膀上的什么东西点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉见到你，嘴角露出了微笑，对你肩膀上的什么东西点了点头。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando Idira te ve, sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa y asiente a algo por encima de tu hombro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando Idira te ve, sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa y asiente a algo por encima de tu hombro.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはあなたを見て唇をほころばせ、あなたの肩越しに何かを見てうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはあなたを見て唇をほころばせ、あなたの肩越しに何かを見てうなずいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Idira dich sieht, formen ihre Lippen ein Lächeln und sie nickt in Richtung von irgendetwas über deiner Schulter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Idira dich sieht, formen ihre Lippen in Lächeln und sie nickt in Richtung von irgendetwas über deiner Schulter.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Quand Idira vous voit, elle sourit et hoche la tête en direction de quelque chose par-dessus votre épaule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand Idira vous voit, elle sourit et hoche la tête en direction de quelque chose par-dessus votre épaule.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın gözüne ilişmenle beraber yüzünde bir gülümseme beliriyor. Omzunun üzerinden baktığı birine başıyla selam veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Idira sees you, her lips curve into a smile and she nods at something over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın seni görmesiyle birlikte yüzünde bir gülümseme beliriyor. Omzunun üzerinden baktığı birine başıyla onay veriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
